name: Buried Pharoah
description:
A Pharoah is resurrected from the dead and seeks vengeance against her brother.  She'll  stop at nothing to seal his soul away into Ouroburos and any creatures that dare follow his traitorous path.

*Made in 50 hours for JimJam#2 

https://itch.io/jam/jimjam-2

Controls:

Move with A and D

Double Jump with Space

Press J to kick butt

Press K in midair to ground pound

Press L to do a sick dash!

When standing still, hold E to absorb Souls into energy
